hero.title: Hey I'm Sito
hero.text: I'm a web fullstack developer and graphic designer

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: but my real name is Carlos Andr√©s Mora Gonz√°lez

content.Content: Programming is one of my greatest passions

I am the son of two Masters in Computer Science, so programming runs through my veins. I started writing my first lines of code when I entered university, studying Computer Science, during my entire study process I was developing desktop applications with Qt and C++.

Upon reaching the second year of my degree, a professor told me that it is possible to develop web pages and servers only with JavaScript, at that very moment I looked for courses to learn that language. I am currently a web page developer, using tools like ReactJs, NodeJs, JavaScript, MaterialUi, NextUi, Firebase, MongoDB

freeTime.title: In my free time
freeTime.more: to play the piano üéπ and take photos üì∑

content.content: I studied music at the Lauro Fuentes community school in Santiago de Cuba. I started studying piano for four years, with an electric keyboard I studied at home and it distracted me, then I had to change to percussion.
